mapper.select: SELECT STUDENTS.ID,STUDENT_NAME,CLASS_NAME,LESSON_NAME,STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID,LESSONS.LESSON_ID,PASSWORD,TIME FROM STUDENTS LEFT JOIN CLASSES ON STUDENTS.CLASS_ID=CLASSES.CLASS_ID LEFT JOIN LESSON_STUDENTS ON STUDENTS.ID=LESSON_STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID LEFT JOIN LESSONS ON LESSON_STUDENTS.LESSON_ID=LESSONS.LESSON_ID WHERE STUDENTS.STUDENT_ID=#{studentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
